query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `measurement_remarks` (
  `id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `measurement_id` int NOT NULL,
  `measurement_type` enum('machine_measurement','spc_analysis','inspection') NOT NULL,
  `remark` text NOT NULL,
  `remark_type` enum('note','issue','correction','observation','action') DEFAULT 'note',
  `severity` enum('info','warning','critical') DEFAULT 'info',
  `image_urls` json,
  `attachment_urls` json,
  `created_by` int,
  `created_by_name` varchar(255),
  `created_at` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updated_at` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  INDEX `idx_measurement_remarks_measurement` (`measurement_id`),
  INDEX `idx_measurement_remarks_type` (`measurement_type`),
  INDEX `idx_measurement_remarks_created_by` (`created_by`)
);
command:

  `id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `measurement_id` int NOT NULL,
  `measurement_type` enum('machine_measurement','spc_analysis','inspection') NOT NULL,
  `remark` text NOT NULL,
  `remark_type` enum('note','issue','correction','observation','action') DEFAULT 'note',
  `severity` enum('info','warning','critical') DEFAULT 'info',
  `image_urls` json,
  `attachment_urls` json,
  `created_by` int,
  `created_by_name` varchar(255),
  `created_at` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updated_at` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  INDEX `idx_measurement_remarks_measurement` (`measurement_id`),
  INDEX `idx_measurement_remarks_type` (`measurement_type`),
  INDEX `idx_measurement_remarks_created_by` (`created_by`)
);
